alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 20 at 12:59AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Patchy Areas of Dense Fog Possible Tonight Through Sunrise... Areas of fog (some locally dense) are forecast to develop across portions of the area. Visibilities are likely to be reduced to around 1 mile in general, with localized areas experiencing reduced visibilities to one-half of a mile at times. Fog may linger through morning just after sunrise. If lower visibilities materialize, a dense fog advisory may be warranted. Motorists are advised to drive with overnight through this morning, as visibilities may widely vary over short distances. Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and others on the road when encountering significant reductions in visibility. Allow extra time to travel to destinations.
